metadata.dc:author: Brezina, A J
metadata.dc:description: Main features of written case reports are explained. Several details to get better reports are pointed out. Some comments made are also valid for the preparation of other kinds of papers in dental literature.
metadata.dc:title: Como presentar por escrito un caso clinico.
[How to present a written case report].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista de la Asociacion Odontologica Argentina
